original: Lindman, Ernst Arnold, fd. hovrättsråd, Jönköping, f. 1/3/77 i 0’skars-hamn av godsäg. Johan Fredrik L. o. Jenny Du Rietz. G. 29 m. Anna Eke-crantz. — Mog:ex. i Växjö 95, jur. fil. ex. i Upps. 96, hovr:ex. 01. Auskult. i Göta hovr. 01, e. o. not. där s. å., tf. domhav. (f. g. i N. o. S. Tjusts härads doms.) sammani. fjorton mån. 04-08, tf. förste rådm. i Västervik 07, i Jönköp. 09, tf. fiskal i Göta hovr. 08, adj. led. 09, fiskal 12, hovr:råd 14-44. ordf. å div. 33-44. . Sekr. i flottn :’lag-stiftn:komm. 11-16, bitr. i just :dep. v. fortsatt behandl. av frågan om ny flottn :lagstiftn. m. m. 17-20, föredr. i lagrådet av vissa lagförslag 18-19, sekr. i riksd:utsk. 19-20, suppl. f. }0 20-22, föreläs, o. tentatox i vattenrätt v. skogshögsk. fiLottn ibefäiskurs 21, led. av landstinget (h) 30-42, v. ordf. i dess förvaltn rutsk. 34-39, led. av o. v. ordf. i drätselkamm. 31-34, ordf. i stadsfullm. soc. nd fr. 34, led. av direkt, f. centr :las. 37-45, ordf. i länets distr :vårds’styr. 37-41, ordf. i Jön-köp. hembygdsfören. fr. 30, v. ordf. o. styr:led. i N. Smål. fornminnes- o. hembygdsförb., ordf. i dess arb lutsk., v. ordf. i Jönköp. jurid. fören. 29-44, styr.-led. i Sv:es hovr. domarefören., ordf. i Fören. f. restaurangkontr. i Ö. Mellansverige fr. 38. Skr.: Den nya fiottn :lagstiftn. (20), Lagen om fri rättegång (20), upps. -i Fiottn rtidskr.. Sv. Jur :tidn.. Sv. Sparbankstidskr. m. f1. KNOlkl, Samf. f. hembygdsvård för-tj :plak., Jönköp. 1. hemb :förb. GM.
translated: Lindman, Ernst Arnold, former court councilor, Jönköping, born on March 1, 1877 in 0'skars-hamn to estate owner Johan Fredrik L. and Jenny Du Rietz. Married on 29 with Anna Eke-crantz. — Graduated from Växjö 95, received a degree in law and philosophy from Uppsala University in 96, passed the court exam in 01. Interned at Göta Court of Appeal in 01, acting notary there in the same year, temporary district judge (previously in Northern and Southern Tjust district courts) for fourteen months from 04-08, acting senior magistrate in Västervik in 07, in Jönköping in 09, acting attorney general at Göta Court of Appeal in 08, adjunct member in 09, attorney general in 12, court councilor from 14-44. Chairman of various committees from 33-44. Secretary of the Logging Law Foundation Commission from 11-16, assistant at the Ministry of Justice in the continued treatment of the issue of new logging legislation, etc. from 17-20, presenter at the Legal Council for certain legislative proposals from 18-19, secretary of the parliamentary committee from 19-20, deputy member from 20-22, lecturer and examiner in water law at the Forestry College Logging Officer Course in 21, member of the County Council (conservative) from 30-42, vice chairman of its administrative committee from 34-39, member and vice chairman of the municipal finance committee from 31-34, chairman of the city council's social welfare committee from 34, member of the board of directors for the central institute of social research from 37-45, chairman of the county welfare board from 37-41, chairman of Jönköping Local History Society from 30, vice chairman and board member of the N. Småland Antiquities and Local History Association, chairman of its working committee, vice chairman of the Jönköping Legal Association from 29-44, board member of the Swedish Court Judges Association, chairman of the Association for Restaurant Control in Central Sweden from 38. Writings: The new logging legislation (20), The Law on Free Legal Proceedings (20), articles in Logging Journal, Swedish Juridical Journal, Swedish Savings Bank Journal, and more. Recipient of the Order of the Polar Star. Member of the Society for Conservation of Cultural Heritage, Jönköping Local Heritage Federation.

memberOf.name: N. Småland Antiquities and Local History Association
